hero.heading: a Data Scientist | AI Developer!
hero.description: Transforming business problems using AI solutions

intro.heading: Innovative Problem Solver
intro.description1: I thrive at the intersection of analytical thinking and cutting-edge technology, transforming complex datasets into actionable insights. With expertise in machine learning, deep learning, and graph analytics, I develop intelligent systems that uncover hidden patterns and drive data-informed decision-making.
intro.description2: Whether it's building local LLM-based solutions, designing entity resolution pipelines, or leveraging graph databases for anomaly detection, I bring a unique blend of technical rigor and strategic thinking to every project.

about.heading: Data Scientist | AI Developer | Problem Solver | Lifelong Learner
about.description: I'm a Data Scientist with a passion for uncovering insights and building intelligent systems that drive real impact. Based in Ottawa, I specialize in machine learning, natural language processing, and currently, I’m diving deep into the mechanics of Large Language Models—building one from scratch to truly understand how they work. My experience blends practical analytics with a hands-on approach to model development, including crafting tools that streamline processes and enhance decision-making. Whether it's developing robust ML pipelines or experimenting with cutting-edge AI.

projects.heading: My Projects
projects.description: Explore my portfolio of projects showcasing my skills in AI, and graph analytics.
